https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/gRs9xjisdmbsh68yYgXFoeHhbhL.jpg A discontented New York family woman is unexpectedly called to Tuscany to execute her estranged mother's will. There, she must decipher visions of her forgotten childhood and confront a spectral "Lady in Red," whose dark secret unlocks a terrifying destiny. Agony
